mapper.insert: insert into review(re_me_id, re_rt_num, re_content, re_totalSc, re_service, re_mood, re_tasty, re_quantity, re_clean) values(#{review.re_me_id}, #{review.re_rt_num}, #{review.re_content}, #{review.re_totalSc}, #{review.re_service}, #{review.re_mood}, #{review.re_tasty}, #{review.re_quantity}, #{review.re_clean})
